# Interface TTSNodePropsInterface

Interface for TTS Node creation properties.

interface TTSNodePropsInterface {  
executionConfig?: [TTSNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface](./graph_nodes_builtin_node_execution_config.TTSNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface);  
id: string;  
synthesisConfig: [SpeechSynthesisConfigInterface](./primitives_tts_config.SpeechSynthesisConfigInterface);  
tts: [TTS](/classes/primitives_tts_tts.TTS);  
}

Execution configuration for the TTS node
